content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -29.5, 30.5), boiler (position -24.5, -50.0), and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to a power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine (position not specified)
- Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace at position -18.0, -49.0 to the assembling machine (position not specified)

### Lab at position(x)
Consists of lab (position not specified) which is currently without power.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to steam engine
- Ensure that the pipes are properly placed and connected before attempting to connect the boiler to the steam engine. Check for any obstructions or misalignments in the pipe connections.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power supply
- Verify that all power-consuming entities (like the lab and steam engine) are connected to a power network and have sufficient power supply.
